text: Hey team, looking to work with Brooklyn Edwards for Autobarn. Budget is approx $31,089 - need 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 3 x Facebook post, 1 x YouTube video, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x Facebook post. 8 weeks exclusivity, 6 month engagement. Usage: 9 months. Start date: October 2025.
